advancement.gensokyoontology.root.title: 不是冻鳗!
description.gensokyoontology.praxis_swor: §6现在，你知道了所有的故事，那么，请开始实践吧~
gui.gensokyoontology.rail_adjust.title: 轨道调整
story.gensokyoontology.chapter_1_1.page_: I can't forget the day when I rest down in peace. The sky was stained by a crimson color like the end of the world. People spread rumors that there falls a mansion of vampires on another side of Misty Lake. I do not believe at first for no one ever comes to the other side of Misty Lake, but here, look at me, I should have believe it...
story.gensokyoontology.chapter_1_2.page_: That was a cold spring which I was starved to die. Snows fall until May 1st. I have wandered around on this icy land for many years ever since then. I was unreconciled, why me? why only my vitality was been taken altogether with the spring?
story.gensokyoontology.chapter_1_3.page_:
Quite a lengthy night!
This is the only thing that I can remember.
tooltip.gensokyoontology.idealism_sword_: 按住 §9SHIFT§r 查看更多信息
tooltip.gensokyoontology.praxis_sword_in: 按住 §9SHIFT§r 查看更多信息
patchouli.gensokyoontology.book.name: 幻想存有论
patchouli.gensokyoontology.book.subtitle: ——作者：宇佐见堇子
patchouli.gensokyoontology.chapter.descr: 幻想乡，一个人与妖怪两相对立却又彼此依存的世界。
patchouli.gensokyoontology.chapter.intro: 你好，我是宇佐见堇子，秘封俱乐部的创始人，当你看见这本书的时候，那就意味着我已经迷失在了那个虚构的国度。也许我，我自己，甚至是正在阅读着这段文字的你，不过也同样是这幻想的一员罢了。我能感受到博丽大结界……十分的不稳定，一场异变马上就要到来了。
我将自己的能力的一部分转移到了这本书里，这样，当我进入幻想之时，这本书便会出现在这座图书馆。如果我失败了，请带上这本书，本书中残余的能量或许能够帮助到你。我想请求你，帮我找到解决这场异变的办法！
patchouli.gensokyoontology.story.chapter: $(l)"Signs often appears before the real crisis." -- Her voice haunted me even though she is no longer be here. I don't know when did those meme entities come into being in our world, but I know that fighting against with those entities for too long will lost one's ego -- and that is how she left me.$(br) Her eyes turned into jewels which could show the images of those entities on the paper, and I am collecting the loots from those monsters:
patchouli.gensokyoontology.task.title: 合成指南
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.title: 已进入幻想的实体
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.descri: Some entities that might summon everywhere. This is not a good sign.$(br)		 -- Usami Sumireko
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.fairy_: The most common and normal creature in Gensokyo. But it is abnormal to see them spawn in Overworld. These creature seems undying because when I was in Gensokyo, I killed a lot of them, but they will soon respawn elsewhere.
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.butter: The big version of the fairy, possessing tougher health but having a large probabilities to drop Bomb Item.
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.inyo_j: Entity Inyo Jade never drops Bomb Point Item, but the fragments of jade and the spirit fragments it dropped may be useful?
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.spectr: These are the wandering souls who once were killed but holding with desperate shame or unwilling mind
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.object: Object a, she is the one you authentically desire to. She could block your truly wantings and force you to worship on items. That's crazy, but thanks to koishi's eye, if you have koishi's eye in any of your inventory slot, you will not be added with fetish effect!
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.koishi: $(l)Such a mystery girl, she once made friends with Hoshizora-chan, nevertheless, Hoshizora left, this girl does not remember me as well...
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.sumire: $(l)You want to know more about me! Yes, I am the one you called JK! And isn't it common to know that Japanese JK can use super powers right?www...
patchouli.gensokyoontology.entity.yukari: $(l)一个凶狠、邪恶、老不死的隙间妖怪gbyhnvucxfyhtgbnujjmik,utyrgf. $(k)gbyhnvucxfyhtgbnujjmik,utyrgf. $()$(l)啊啦，如果你敢这么称呼我的话……$(ff0000)你也会落得和这个女孩儿一样的下场哟!$()
patchouli.gensokyoontology.ideology.magn: Well, it seems that you have to find a container to paint, follow the lead to paint on the correct pixel location with correct color type.
Yes! Programming in Minecraft. Remember what I wrote on the first page? Stay sane! or you will become Cyber Spirits. To check whether you could read this digital gibberish to test if you are becoming cyber ghost or not.

In inner IDE, your code should be highlighted like this:$(br2)$(l)SAMPLE 1: $(br)$(1)public abstract class$() $(l)ThrowableEntity $(1)extends$() $(l)ProjectileEntity(){$(br)  $(1)protected$() $(l)$(#ffa500)ThrowableEntity$()$(l)(EntityType<? $(1)extends$() $(l)ThrowableEntity> type, World worldIn) {$(br)$(1)    super$() $(l)worldIn;$(br)  }$(br)})
